Issues with stool adequacy at the country level

Source: R/dr.figure.functions.R
generate_inad_tab.Rd

Generates a summary table at the country level highlighting issues around stool adequacy.

Usage

generate_inad_tab(afp_data, cstool, start_date, end_date)

Arguments

afp_data

tibble afp.all.2 of the output of extract_country_data().

cstool

tibble Stool adequacy at the country level. This is the output of f.stool.ad.01().

start_date

str Start date of analysis.

end_date

str End date of analysis.

Value

flextable Summary table containing stool adequacy issues at the country level.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
ctry.data <- init_dr("algeria")
start_date <- "2021-01-01"
end_date <- "2023-12-31"
cstool <- f.stool.ad.01(
  afp.data = ctry.data$afp.all.2,
  admin.data = ctry.data$ctry.pop,
  start.date = start_date,
  end.date = end_date,
  spatial.scale = "ctry",
  missing = "good",
  bad.data = "inadequate",
  rolling = F,
  sp_continuity_validation = F
)
generate_inad_tab(ctry.data, cstool, start_date, end_date)
} # }
